https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1zXjBLG71HbNrv4v0TO1CtQDHVu.jpg A boy starts an affair with his famous dad's young new wife - an instinctive way of victory of a confused soul over his parent's inadequacy. Ever haunting dreams about his real mother start overwhelming the boy more and more often. Unsuspecting a thing, the father keeps trying to carry out his own views on beauty upon their joint living. In vain - faith intends differently. Adultery
